import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Context } from ".."; import { useLayoutEffect, useRef } from "react"; import gsap from "gsap"; import NavBar from '../components/NavBar'; import AppRouter from "../components/AppRouter"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/esm/Container"; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Hotline from '../assets/Hotline.svg' import WorkHours from '../assets/ic_access_time_48px.svg' import Place from '../assets/Place.svg' import '../styles/gradient.css' import '../styles/text-styles.css' import '../fonts/font.css'; import '../styles/images-styles.css' const MainPage = () => { const {user} = useContext(Context) const textRef = useRef(null); const spanRef = useRef(null); useLayoutEffect(() => { gsap.fromTo( textRef.current, { x: -spanRef.current.clientWidth + 'px'}, { x: 0, duration: 5, repeat: -1, ease: 'none'} ); }, []); return ( <>
